My mom and I (and 2 of the furballs) took a quick trip to ME, NH, and VT. It was a bittersweet getaway as we made some of my dad's favorite stops.

Gigi the Squishmallow is pleased to be #Troy's honorary Mayor for a Day, meeting Mayor Ethan Baker and sitting in on a City Council meeting. Gigi put forward a motion for everyone to eat mice for dinner every day‚Ä¶thankfully, it was not seconded. Donate: https://t.co/vPyRVZQUwr https://t.co/wGyhfW5EJ0
